objects.text:
• Premium Faux Leather
• Spacious Design
• Gold Hardware Accents

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
The banner is a promotional design for a fashion accessory, split into two main sections. The left half features a dark chocolate brown overlay with decorative line accents in soft gold at the top and bottom. This side contains multiple layered texts including a bold main headline **(heading)**, a sleek subheadline **(subheading)**, a bullet-pointed feature list **(description)**, a prominent price label **(price)**, and a rectangular call-to-action button **(cta_button)** with contrasting text **(cta)**. The right half displays a high-resolution image of a tan tote bag **(product_image)** popping out from a warm beige background with a radial gradient. Background elements include faded spherical highlights and subtle, tilted linear accents.

**Color Palette:**
- Dark Brown: `#2D2318`
- Warm Beige Gradient: `#E6CCAC` to `#D4B596`
- Accent Gold: `#C6A87C`
- Soft Sand: `#E8D5BC`
product_color: The product image features a sophisticated ALDO handbag in a warm, muted brown tone, creating a luxurious yet neutral base. The dominant color is a soft camel brown (#A97462), complemented by elegant gold metal accents (#D4AF37) on the clasps, logo, and key charm chain. These gold details add a premium feel and visually pop against the matte leather texture. The harmonious blend of brown and gold evokes elegance and timelessness. For an advertisement banner, a palette of Camel Brown (#A97462), Warm Beige (#E6D4C3), Classic Gold (#D4AF37), and Cream White (#FDF8F3) would enhance the product's classy aesthetic while maintaining minimalistic appeal.
